data.title: Stirnet
data.text: Lawrence Washington, 1st of Sulgrave (b c1500, d 19.02.1584) m1. (c1518) Elizabeth Gough (dsp) m2. (c1538) Amy Pargiter (d 06.10.1564, dau of Robert Partiger) 1. Robert Washington of Sulgrave (b 1544) m1. (c1565) Elizabeth Light (b c1547, d 25.03.1599) A. Lawrence Washington of Sulgrave (b 1568, d 13.12.1616) m. (03.08.1588) Margaret Butler (b c1602, d 01.1652, dau of William Butler of Tyes Hall, Cuckfield) i. Robert Washington (b c1589) ii. John Washington of Thrapston (b 1591, d 18.05.1668) m1. (14.06.1621) Mary Curtis (d 01.01.1625) a. John Washington (b 1623/4, d 1660, 3rd son) m. (15.11.1658) Mary Flood (dau of John Flood) (1) Richard Washington (b 05.09.1660, d 19.05.1725, emigrated to Virginia) m. (1682) Elizabeth Jordan (d 21.05.1735) (A) George Washington (b c1682, d 10.1763) m. (c1700) Mary Wright (i) Andrew Washington had issue m. Margaret Bridger (ii) Richard Washington (d 07.1803) (B) Richard Washington (b c1685, d c1765) m1. Hannah Mumfree (d 1764) (i) Richard Washington (b 1716, d 1769) (ii) John Washington (b 1718, d 1790) (a) Sarah Washington m. _ Atkinson (iii) William Washington (b 1720, d 1799) had issue m. Tabatha Reeves (b 1724) (iv Mary Washington (b 1722) m. Henry Hawton (v) Priscilla Washington (b 1724) m. Jesse Brewer m2. Patience (i) Ethelred Washington (C) Elizabeth Washington (b c1689, d c1773) m. Sampson Lanier b.+ other issue - Thomas (d before 01.05.1625), Mordaunt (b c1622, d before 1688), Philip (b before 27.12.1624, d before 26.09.1643) m2. (c1625) Dorothy Pargiter e.+ other issue - Elizabeth (b c1627, d before 04.07.1632), William (b c1630, d before 25.03.1639) iii. Sir William Washington of Packington (b after 1590, d 22.06.1643) m. Anne Villiers (dau of Sir George Villiers of Brokesby, Sheriff of Leicestershire) a. Sir Henry Washington of Packington (b 1615, d 09.03.1662-3) m. Elizabeth Packington (dau of Sir John Pakington, 1st Bart) (1) Katherine Washington (3rd daughter) m1. _ Forster m2. Barnabus Tonstall (2) Elizabeth Washington m. Stephen Gellott (3)+ other issue - Mary (d 1680), Penelope (d 02.03.1696-7) b. Elizabeth Washington (d 1688) m. William Legge (d 1672) c. Susannah Washington (b 15.01.1618, d 26.02.1697-8) m. Reginald Graham d.+ other issue - George (b 13.01.1618-9), Christopher iv. Richard Washington (b c1592) v. Lawrence Washington (b 1602, d 1655, Rector of Purleigh) m. (1633) Amphyllis Twigden (b 1602, d 1655, dau of John Twigden of Little Creaton) a. John Washington of Mattox Creek (b 1634, emigrated to Virginia, USA, in 1656, 2nd son) The following is partly supported by FMG (vol 4, MS624, 'Washington', p1293+) & FMG (vol 2, MS193, 'Washington', p443+). The latter shows John as son rather than grandson of Laurence of Sulgrave & Margaret Butler. m1. (before 1658) Margaret Haywood m2. (01.12.1658) Anne Pope (b 1635, d c1669, dau of Nathaniel Pope of The Cliffs, Virginia, Lt. Col.) (1) Lawrence Washington of Mattox Creek (b 09.1659, d 02.1697/8) m. (c1686/9) Mildred Warner (b c1671, d before 30.01.1701, dau of Augustine Warner of Warner Hall) (A) John Washington of Gloucester County (b c1690) m. Catherine Whiting of Gloucester County (i) Warner Washington of Frederick County (b 22.09.1722, d 1791) m1. Elizabeth Macon (dau of Col. William Macon of New Kent County) m2. Hannah Fairfax (dau of William Fairfax, Governor of the Bahamas) (a) Warner Washington had issue, shown by FMG as son of Elizabeth Macon m. _ Whiting of Gloucester (b) Louisa Washington (dsp 28.04.1798) m. (02.02.1798) Thomas Fairfax, 9th Lord of Cameron (b 1762, d 21.04.1846) (c)+ other issue (ii)+ other issue - Augustine, Catharine, Francis, Henry, Lawrence, Mildred (B) Augustine Washington (b c1694, d 12.04.1743) m1. (20.04.1715) Jane Butler (b c1699, d 24.11.1728/9, dau of Caleb Butler of Westmorland) (i) Butler Washington (d young) (ii) Lawrence Washington of Mount Vernon m. (19.07.1743) Anne Nancy Fairfax (b c1728, d 14.03.1761, dau of William Fairfax, Governor of the Bahamas) (a)+ issue - Jane (b 27.09.17444, d 01.1746), Fairfax (b 22.08.1747, d 08.1747), Mildred (b 28.09.1748, d c1749), Sarah (b 07.11.1750, d 09.1752) (iii) Augustine Washington (b 1720, d 1762) m. (c1743) Anne Aylott (b 1726, d 1773) (a) Elizabeth Washington (b 15.11.1749) m. (15.02.1789) Brig.Gen. Alexander Spotswood (b) William Augustus Washington of George Town (b 25.11.1757, d 02.10.1810, Brig.Gen.) had issue m1. (25.09.1777) Jane Washington (b 20.06.1759, d 16.08.1791) @1@ below m2. (10.08.1792) Mary Lee (b 28.07.1764, d 02.11.1795, dau of Richard Henry Lee) m3. (11.05.1799) Sarah March (b 05.03.1765, d 03.09.1834) (c)+ other issue - Lawrence (b c1745, d c1746), Augustine (b c1747, d c1748), Anne (b 02.04.1752, d 03.06.1777), Jane (b 04.1756, d 10.1833), George (b c1760, d 03.1781) (iv) Jane Washington (b c1722, d 17.01.1735) m2. (06.03.1730-1) Mary Ball (b c1707, d 25.08.1789, dau of Joseph Ball) (v) George Washington, 1st President of the USA (b 22.02.1732, d 14.12.1799)§A§F m. (16.01.1759) Martha Dandridge (b 21.06.1731, d 22.05.1802, dau of Jonn Dandridge) (a) Eleanor Parke Custis (b 1779, d 1852) m. Anne Washington probably of this generation m. Edmond Foster of Hanslape vii.+ other issue - Thomas (b c1603, d c1623), Gregory (b 16.01.1607, d 17.01.1607), George (b/d 03.08.1608), 7 other daughters B. Robert Washington (b after 1568, d 10.03.1622) m. (15.02.1596) Elizabeth Ceshall (b c1568, d 19.03.1622/3) C. Walter Washington 'of Radway/Redway' (b c1570, d 1597) m. Alice Morden i. John Washington (b 1595) m. Mary Danvers ii. Kathrine Washington (b c1597) m. Thomas Stanton of Wolverton Hall (b c1585) D. Christopher Washington (b c1573, d 01.01.1597) m. (c1591) Margaret Palmer E. William Washington (b c1575) i.+ issue - Frances, Ann, Ann F. Thomas Washington (b c1577) G. Anne Washington (b c1579) m. (c1597) Alban Wakelyn H. Ursula Washington (b c1581) m. (c1599) Thomas Adcock I. Elizabeth Washington (b c1583) m. (b c1601) Lewis Richardson m2. (c1600) Anne Fisher 2. Lawrence Washington A. Sir Lawrence Washington, 1st of Garesden or Garsdon, Wiltshire (b 1578-9, bur 04.05.1643) m. (1609) Anne Lewyn (d 13.06.1645) i. Lawrence Washington, 2nd of Garesden m. Eleanor Guise (dau of William Guise of Elmore) a. Elizabeth Washington (b c1655, d 02.10.1693) m. (28.12.1671) Sir Robert Shirley, 7th Bart, later 1st Earl Ferrers (bpt 20.10.1650, d 25.12.1717) ii. Martha Washington (d 12.1670) m. (06.1630) Sir John Tyrrell of Heron & Springfield (d 03.04.1675) iii. Elizabeth Washington (dsp) probably of this generation m. Sir Christopher Guise, 1st Bart of Elmore 3. Frances Washington (b 1550) m. (1568) John Thompson 4. Ann Washington (b 1552) m. Edmund Fisher 5. Mary Washington (b 1555, d 1622) m. Abel Makepeace (b c1555, d 1602) 6. Barbara Washington (bur 01.04.1635) probably of this generation, of this marriage m. Simon Butler of Appletree (bpt 06.05.1549, bur 16.06.1628)
